FILTER (regex(?mineral,'Gold')) . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } } GROUP BY ?uri ?string HAVING (COUNT(?cave) > 2)

question.string: Which mountain is the highest after the Annapurna?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { res:Annapurna dbo:elevation ?elevation . ?uri rdf:type dbo:Mountain . ?uri dbo:elevation ?otherelevation . FILTER (?otherelevation < ?elevation) . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } } ORDER BY DESC(?otherelevation) LIMIT 1

question.string: Which bridges are of the same type as the Manhattan Bridge?

FILTER (regex(?design, ?mdesign)). FILTER (?uri != res:Manhattan_Bridge) . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Country . ?uri dbp:officialLanguages ?language . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } } ORDER BY DESC(COUNT(?language)) LIMIT 1
question.squall: which dbo:Country has the most dbp:officialLanguages ?

question.string: In which programming language is GIMP written?
question.squall: what is the dbo:programmingLanguage of res:GIMP ?

question.string: Who produced films starring Natalie Portman?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?film rdf:type dbo:Film . ?film dbo:starring res:Natalie_Portman . ?film dbo:producer ?uri . OPTIONAL {?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }
question.squall: what are the dbo:producer-s of the dbo:Film-s that are dbo:starring res:Natalie_Portman ?

question.string: Give me all movies with Tom Cruise.
question.squall: which dbo:Film-s are dbo:starring res:Tom_Cruise ?

question.string: In which films did Julia Roberts as well as Richard Gere play?
question.keywords: Julia Roberts, Richard Gere, film, play
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Film . ?uri dbo:starring res:Julia_Roberts . ?uri dbo:starring res:Richard_Gere. OPTIONAL {?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }
question.squall: which dbo:Film-s are dbo:starring res:Julia_Roberts and res:Richard_Gere ?

question.string: Give me all female German chancellors.
question.query: PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:FemaleHeadsOfGovernment. ?uri dbp:office res:Chancellor_of_Germany . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }
question.squall: which yago:FemaleHeadsOfGovernment have dbp:office res:Chancellor_of_Germany ?

question.string: Who wrote the book The pillars of the Earth?
question.keywords: wrote, book, The pillars of the Earth
question.squall: what is the dbo:author of res:The_Pillars_of_the_Earth ?

question.string: How many films did Leonardo DiCaprio star in?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?uri) WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Film . ?uri dbo:starring res:Leonardo_DiCaprio . }
question.squall: how many dbo:Film-s are dbo:starring res:Leonardo_DiCaprio ?

question.string: Was Natalie Portman born in the United States?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ASK WHERE { res:Natalie_Portman dbo:birthPlace ?city . ?city dbo:country res:United_States . }
question.squall: has res:Natalie_Portman a dbo:birthPlace whose dbo:country is res:United_States ?
